name: Rock Paper Scissor Run
description:
Rock Paper Scissor run (RPS) is  my submission the the weekly game  jam #154

The theme is Rock, Paper, scissors.

My game is a procedural generated obstacle course about staying alive as  long as you can (temple -run style) while dodging  obstacles like windows, bushes and small  gaps, by transforming to the appropriate  object. (I.E Rock, paper, scissors)
